Tools inherited from base R

Source: R/pipeline_tools.R
tools.Rd

Tools inherited from base R

Usage

# S3 method for class 'PipelinePtr'
print(x, ...)

# S3 method for class 'PipelinePtr'
e1 + e2

# S3 method for class 'PipelinePtr'
x[[i, ...]]

Arguments

x, e1, e2

lasR objects

...

lasR objects. Is equivalent to +

i

index

Examples

algo1 <- rasterize(1, "max")
algo2 <- rasterize(4, "min")
print(algo1)
#> -----------
#> rasterize (uid:7e0b7adc56ff)
#>   method : [max] 
#>   window : 1.00 
#>   res : 1.00 
#>   filter : [] 
#>   output : /tmp/RtmpgkeGLz/file255b510962c0.tif 
#> -----------
#> 
#> NULL
pipeline <- algo1 + algo2
print(pipeline)
#> -----------
#> rasterize (uid:7e0b7adc56ff)
#>   method : [max] 
#>   window : 1.00 
#>   res : 1.00 
#>   filter : [] 
#>   output : /tmp/RtmpgkeGLz/file255b510962c0.tif 
#> -----------
#> rasterize (uid:ca083f22a156)
#>   method : [min] 
#>   window : 4.00 
#>   res : 4.00 
#>   filter : [] 
#>   output : /tmp/RtmpgkeGLz/file255b30b0598e.tif 
#> -----------
#> 
#> NULL
